projects.title: House Teardown
projects.description1: This project involved the complete demolition of a two-story residential home in Toronto, including foundation removal and site cleanup.
projects.description2: Our team efficiently managed debris disposal and ensured compliance with local regulations, completing the job ahead of schedule.

projects.title: Office Building Removal
projects.description1: A multi-story office building was demolished to make way for a new development in Mississauga, requiring careful structural dismantling.
projects.description2: We handled hazardous material abatement and recycled 80% of the materials, aligning with sustainability goals.
